Name: Restore Plushie Village I
Description: Through your hard work, meaningful changes have taken root in Plushie Village. In the meantime, the village receives a new visitor—a Tubpup.
QuestDesc: Through your hard work, meaningful changes have taken root in Plushie Village. In the meantime, the village receives a new visitor—a Tubpup.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}, you're here! Thanks to you, much of the painting's power has been restored. And look, a new friend has joined our little village!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bubble used to live in Egla Town, but its master moved to the city. Unfortunately, it was too costly to bring a Tubpup along.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's probably not a good idea to leave Bubble wandering around, so I brought it here instead.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (It's understandable to want a new tub for a new home. But it seems that Echoes are more than just furniture for people in Rinascita.)

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you going to find a new owner for Bubble?
I can help you deliver it there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The most important thing in a community is looking out for each other's needs, and the Plushies just happen to need a proper tub. Bubble is meant to be here!

Options.PlotLineKey: True enough. Bubble suits the Plushies well.
Bubble is too small for that big fella over there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, take it easy, big guy. I'll clean you up myself!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, we still need your help to collect more Sonance Caskets. The Plushie Village is only just getting started!

Options.PlotLineKey: As long as I get paid.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No problem at all! The more power we restore to the painting, the more rewards it will be able to give out—guaranteed!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Subtle but significant changes have taken root in Plushie Village. A Tubpup has come along.
